title: Death Blossom Kha'Zix bug (visual only)
body:
When his Q is evolved, the evolved version appears briefly, then reverts back to looking like the original version.  The evolved version reappears upon death.
steps:
1) play kha'zix
2) put 1 ability point into his q
3) reach level 6
4) evolve his q
5)???
6) profit
7) die
8) look at body

replies.body:
Hey Schizzlez - 

Thanks for the report! I've gone ahead and tried the information and I'm not able to repro the issue. Would you happen to have any video of this issue?
